title: reinhardt and Morde are very similar
body:
http://img.ifcdn.com/images/c800c4f3cf5600d1719a44e97371ef8b2ae14fa8a0e2f8a13ed5d4aed3a66a5a_1.jpg

They both Tilt baddies equally well.

replies.body:
And both are well passed their prime
http://66.media.tumblr.com/4831d81bd3a11ffe393b792e11018be6/tumblr_o5yphp7byG1r3h131o4_500.gif

I thought of Reinhardt to be like Sion as well.

-Large weapon

-Ground slam

-Charge

-Projectile

-Old
I see Rein more like Braum, because Rein's attitude is so light hearted
I've always seen him more like Braum but hey that's just me.
Reinhardt is more like Sion in abilities, Giant smash that stuns opponents, charge, weird projectile
He ain't just a walking shield that's for sure.
